expo.name: Bandex
expo.description: Band index on your phone.  Bands get their own app to market their music and gigs and interact with fans. Users can find local bands, gigs and music.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos that the user can use in the marketing they create with the app.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses FaceID and TouchID to allow users to log in
